textAfterTable: Latest revisions # Date Author Comment 1164 08/16/2013 12:44 pm Chris Grandin Check for existence of admb-cfg.bat in adcomp.bat 1163 08/16/2013 12:41 pm Chris Grandin Fixed dll compilation in Windows. Now works with VS and mingw 1162 08/16/2013 09:18 am Chris Grandin Better integration of debugging library gdbprintlib into admb. The admb and admb.bat scripts now pass a debug flag to tpl2cpp.exe and tpl2rem.exe which insert the void function call to pad() in the main body of the CPP file. This allows the debugger to see the functions inside gdbprintlib and allows the user to use them inside a gdb session. CG 1130 07/29/2013 02:48 pm Johnoel Ancheta Add
